refbody.section: PurposeDisplay the firmware version active on the appliance.

ExampleDisplay the active firmware version.Console> show version Installation date: Mar 9, 2012 8:06:27 PM Platform version: 4.9.4.0 Platform build ID: build12-20120309-1307 Platform build date: 2012-03-09 18:09:44+00:00 Machine type/model: 923572X Serial number: 68A0553 Firmware type: Development Console>

Information for consumers onlyThe output displayed for this command is configurable. See the "Customizing and extending the CLI" page in the SDK documentation page for information about customizing the show version support.
